item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the November meeting of the Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP group.

This monthâ€™s topic: Resource Anchoring

How would you like to have your own powerful internal resources at your beck and call? How would you like to feel strong and motivated whenever you needed it? Enthusiastic? Ecstatic? Whatever the resourceful state you wish, you can have it when and where you want it. NLP gives us several ways to do this. Come and learn and experience how.




Kevin

Kevin Martin
NLP Master Practitioner, Hypnotist
Positive Effects
Methuen, MA
(978) 273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com----------------------------------
Helping people to help themselves
